Why Service Businesses Choose Thorbis

No Sales Pressure. No Lock-Ins.
Just Software That Works.

Unlike traditional FSM companies, we believe in letting our product speak for itself. Try it, love it, or leave—no hard feelings, no contracts, no hassle.

No Pushy Sales Teams

Try the full platform yourself. No demos, no sales calls unless you want one. Self-service signup takes 60 seconds.

No Contracts or Lock-Ins

Cancel anytime with one click. Keep your data. We earn your business every single month, not through contracts.

5-Minute Intelligent Setup

Smart onboarding form asks the right questions for your business. No lengthy operational assessments or expensive consultants.

Top-Tier Support Included

Real humans respond in under 2 hours. We help with anything—setup, training, or custom workflows. No extra support tiers.

We Actually Listen & Fix Things

Found a bug? Need a feature? We build what service businesses actually need. Our roadmap is driven by user feedback, not enterprise sales quotas. Most requests ship within 2-4 weeks.

Mobile app adoption

Made for modern service teams

Everything you need to run a profitable field service business in one beautifully-designed platform.

Smart Scheduling

Drag-and-drop scheduling with real-time availability. AI suggests optimal routes and time slots based on location, skills, and job requirements.

Mobile Field App

Complete jobs, capture photos, collect signatures, and accept payments—all from a mobile device that works offline.

AI-Powered Dispatch

Intelligent routing that optimizes drive time and maximizes revenue. The system learns from your business patterns.

Instant Invoicing

Generate professional invoices in seconds. Accept payments on-site with same-day funding. No more chasing down payments.

Customer Portal

Give customers 24/7 access to service history, invoices, and scheduling. Reduce support calls and improve satisfaction.

Equipment Tracking

Track equipment maintenance, warranties, and service history. Never miss a preventive maintenance opportunity.

How it works

Set the product direction

From lead to payment, Thorbis streamlines every step of your service workflow.

01

Lead comes in

Phone call, web form, or customer portal booking—every lead automatically routes to your CRM. AI scores urgency and potential value, so you know which to prioritize.

  • Automatic lead capture
  • AI urgency scoring
  • Customer history lookup
  • Smart routing rules
01
02

Schedule in seconds

Drag and drop to schedule. The system automatically accounts for drive time between jobs, technician skills, parts availability, and customer preferences.

  • Real-time availability
  • Automatic route optimization
  • Skills-based assignment
  • Customer notifications
02
03

Execute in the field

Technicians get complete job details on their mobile device: customer history, equipment records, parts needed, and custom checklists. Work offline, sync when connected.

  • Offline-first mobile app
  • Digital checklists
  • Photo capture
  • Electronic signatures
03
04

Get paid same-day

Invoice generated automatically from job completion. Accept payment on-site via card, ACH, or send via text/email. Funds hit your account the same day.

  • Same-day funding
  • Multiple payment methods
  • Automatic reminders
  • Payment plans available
04
Issue tracking you'll enjoy using

Track every job like
a precision operation

From emergency calls to scheduled maintenance, every job is tracked with military precision. Know exactly where your team is, what they're working on, and when they'll finish.

  • Real-time GPS tracking

    See your entire team on a live map

  • Two-way communication

    Chat with techs without phone tag

  • Automated updates

    Customers get real-time status updates

foundations
